stories.Title: Bard is getting better
stories.Description: Google's AI has faced hurdles since its launch, but now "code execution" is improving its development in math and coding.
stories.Tweet: Bard is getting better 📦 Google's AI has faced hurdles since its launch, but now "code execution" is improving its development in math and coding. #google https://blog.google/technology/ai/bard-improved-reasoning-google-sheets-export/

stories.Title: Man Vs. Algorithm

stories.Title: Russia aims for the moon

stories.Title: Starship gets on Artemis' way
stories.Description: NASA's worries grow over SpaceX's Starship progress, potentially impacting the target timeline for Artemis 3.The extensive work remaining and the number of launches needed has raised doubts.
stories.Tweet: Starship gets on Artemis' way 📦 NASA's worries grow over SpaceX's Starship progress, potentially impacting the target timeline for Artemis 3.The extensive work remaining and the number of launches needed has raised doubts. #NASA https://spacenews.com/nasa-concerned-starship-problems-will-delay-artemis-3/

stories.Title: Get your iPhone to talk like you
stories.Description: The latest accessibility feature on iOS called “Personal Voice” allows users to preserve and use their own voice for text. A breakthrough function that benefits individuals with disabilities.

stories.Title: Share your thoughts with WhatsApp
